p: The strong anti-correlation for ∆F R on ∆T of −0.66 (R1) suggests validity in our assumption in both analytical models that the net downward coupled surface flux responses have a negative linear dependence on SST biases. Since ∆F R ≈ λ F ∆T the ΔF R on ΔT regression slope provides a multi-model mean estimate of λ F of approximately −5.5 ± 1.6 Wm −2K −1.
